PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12732018-10-10,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActCustoms Tariff
SubjectOrder Imposing a Surtax on the Importation of Certain Steel Goods
PrecisOrder Imposing a SURTAX ON THE IMPORTATION OF CERTAIN STEEL GOODS in order to (1) address the injury to domestic producers caused by import increases of those goods referred to the Canadian International Trade Tribunal (CITT) while the CITT conducts its inquiry; and (2) impose a provisional safeguard measure for 200 days on imports of heavy plate, rebar, energy tubular products, hot-rolled sheet, pre-painted steel, stainless steel wire and wire rod, entering into force ten business days after its registration.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0206 Publication Date: 2018-10-31
AttachmentsAttachment
